c74object.name: nw.trainshift~
c74object.description: Outputs pulse signals like 'train~' with evenly-spaced phase relationships between the outlets. Originally created for use with 'grain.pulse~' object, but there are other applications.

inlet.digest: Pulse width or duty cycle between 0.0 to 1.0

outlet.digest: Audio signal: the generated pulse output. Each outlet will be evenly spaced across the interval.

objarg.name: num-outlets
objarg.digest: Sets the number of outlets. Defaults to minimum 2. Maximum is 64
